creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly acquired by the Center with the kind assistance of Carol Brooks and Prof. James Cahill in honor of George Schlenker
description: faded, darkened image of several seated figures crying and facing L: group of decorated figures seated upper center; robed monk at L with beard; skinny, bald figure at LLQ, and white robed figure LRC near demon
medium: Ink and light color on silk
title: Death of Buddha (parinirvana), fragment
